messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Monopoly Jr.
messages.msgSnippet: Go here: http://www.centralconnector.com/GAMES/monopolyjr.html If for some reason you can t lmk and I ll copy/paste then send you the instructions via email...
messages.messageBody:
Go here:
http://www.centralconnector.com/GAMES/monopolyjr.html


If for some reason you can't lmk and I'll copy/paste then send you the instructions via email...

good site for anyone whose missing rules to a game..their list is quite extensive.

http://www.centralconnector.com/GAMES/GameCab.html
----- Original Message -----
From: troybridgetm
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, October 22, 2002 7:53 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Monopoly Jr.


I don't post very often...and to post this is kinda funny...but my
son got out Monopoly Jr.the other day...and we can't find the rules.
Could someone please email me the rules???? :-) Bridget
